Title: Revenge O' The Nerds
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), Jennifer Irwin, Lauren Bans (executive story editor), Matt Mira (executive story editor), Erik Weiner (executive story editor), Aaron Kaczander (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Beverly tries to reinvent herself in more than one way, while Erica asks for Adam's help at college.
